scripts.build:staging: dotenv -e .env.staging -- tsc -b && dotenv -e .env.staging -- vite build --mode staging
scripts.build:production: dotenv -e .env.production -- tsc -b && dotenv -e .env.production -- vite build --mode production
scripts.start:staging: npm run build:staging && dotenv -e .env.staging -- pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs --only book-launch-website-staging --env staging --update-env
scripts.start:production: npm run build:production && dotenv -e .env.production -- pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs --only book-launch-website-production --env production --update-env
